text: Narody Ada i Samuda porazili molnii posle togo, kak prishli k nim poslantsy s raznykh storon i vsemi sposobami prizyvali ikh k vere v Allakha, govorya im: "Ne poklonyaytes' nikomu, krome Allakha". No lyudi Ada i Samuda otvetili: "Yesli by Allakh pozhelal poslat' poslannika, on by napravil k nam angelov. My ne verim v to (t.ye. v yedinobozhiye), k chemu vy nas prizyvayete
